scripts.package: npm run build; npm run uglify; npm run package-win; npm run package-osx; npm run package-linux;
scripts.package-win: mkdir -p dist; npm run win-icon; electron-packager ./electron $(node -e 'console.log(process.env.npm_package_name)') --platform='win32' --arch='x64' --app-version=$(node -e 'console.log(process.env.npm_package_version)') --out='dist/' --overwrite=true --icon='./dist/win.ico'
scripts.package-osx: mkdir -p dist; npm run osx-icon; electron-packager ./electron $(node -e 'console.log(process.env.npm_package_name)') --platform='darwin' --arch='x64' --app-version=$(node -e 'console.log(process.env.npm_package_version)') --out='dist/' --overwrite=true --icon='./dist/osx.icns'
scripts.uglify: for f in $(ls electron/web/js/*.js electron/web/preload/*.js); do node_modules/uglify-js/bin/uglifyjs $f -o $f --screw-ie8; done;
scripts.zip: pushd dist/Inboox-linux-x64; zip -FSr ../../download/inboox-linux.zip . -x '*.DS_Store'; popd; pushd dist/Inboox-win32-x64; zip -FSr ../../download/inboox-win.zip . -x '*.DS_Store'; popd; pushd dist/Inboox-darwin-x64; zip -FSr ../../download/inboox-osx.zip . -x '*.DS_Store'; popd;
